subject: FROM THE DESK OF MARKSON WIL
body:
FROM THE DESK OF MARKSON WILLIAMS
UNITED NATIONS ASSOCIATION UK
3 WHITEHALL COURT
LONDON,SW1A 2EL
UNITED KINGDOM
TEL:+44-872-797-4975
Attention Sir,
 
                       RE-YOUR INHERITANCE PAYMENT VALUED AT US$5,250,000.00
Greetings to you and your family in the matchless Name of our God ,in him we live,move and have our being.  How are you doing today and your family? l hope they are in the best of good health.
Meanwhile I have not heard from you to know if you have contacted and heard from the Bank as directed.Please kindly get back to me as soon as possible for the record and reference purpose.
Thanks and Do have a very Wonderful Tuesday, as I wait to hear from you soon.
Yours Faithfully,
MR.MARKSON WILLIAMS
HEAD OF PAYMENT UNIT
THE UNITED NATIONS ASSOCIATION
UNITED KINGDOM

subject: Re:   FROM THE DESK OF MARKSON WIL
body:
Hello Mr. Williams,

I hope this message finds you well. I am doing fine, thank you for asking. My family is also in good health.

Regarding your previous message, I must admit that I haven't contacted the bank yet. Could you please provide me with more details about what exactly I need to do? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nathan
